players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "I find it strange that Charlie was the one found dead last night. Let's keep a close eye on each other and make sure we vote wisely."

You: "I'm shocked about Charlie. We need to be really careful here - with only three of us left, one wrong vote and the mafia wins. Does anyone have any information that might help us figure out who did this?"

Diana: "Based on the information we have, it seems that one of us is hiding something. Let's try to gather more clues and share any suspicions we might have. We need to work together to ensure the safety of our village."
You: "Bob, you've been completely silent. That's really suspicious behavior when we're trying to figure out who killed Charlie. Why aren't you helping us solve this?"
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
